# Dwarka Nath Tiwary

Dwarka Nath Tiwary (1901 â€“ 29 August 1993)  was an Indian politician from Bihar. He was a member of Lok Sabha for four  terms from Gopalganj. He participated in Indian independence movement and was imprisoned. Tiwary died on 29 August 1993, at the age of 92.
